sourceMeaningMnemonic: This <radical>gate</radical> makes the <radical>sound</radical> of <kanji>darkness</kanji>. The gate looks like darkness, but it’s even more creepy that it sounds like darkness too.
meaningInfo: Imagine this gate making an ominous sound. The sound of darkness. Look deep into the darkness of the gate as you hear the sound it makes. Ouummmmm…
readingMnemonic: You decide to taste the <kanji>darkness</kanji> and discover that it is so <reading>yummy</reading> (<ja>やみ</ja>)! Who knew that darkness was so yummy? Mmm… this darkness tastes so yummy!
readingInfo: Take the darkness in your hands. It’s like really dark cotton candy. Imagine eating it and how yummy it is. Keep hearing the sound it’s making as you eat. Yummy!
